document.heading: Water Quality Assurance Amendment Act of 2012

history.narrative: Law 19-240, the “Water Quality Assurance Amendment Act of 2012,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-769. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on Nov. 1, 2012 and Nov. 15, 2012, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on Dec. 4, 2012, it was assigned Act No. 19-560 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 19-240 became effective on Mar. 19, 2013.
